title: Leader Rodgers Calls on NHTSA to Ease the Burden of Inflation and Supply Chain Issues for Americans
description: Washington, D.C. — Following announcements this week from the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration regarding new vehicle fuel economy standards and penalties on automakers, House Energy and Commerce Committee Republican Leader Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-WA) urged the Administration to ease the burden for millions of Americans that has been brought on by high inflation and the supply chain crisis.

title: Rodgers and Westerman: Biden’s Critical Minerals Announcement Misses Bigger Picture
description: Washington, D.C. — Today, President Joe Biden announced he is invoking Defense Protection Act powers in order to ramp up domestic production of critical minerals.

title: Leader Rodgers: SPR Release Will Not Alleviate the Pain at the Pump. We Must Flip the Switch ON American Energy.
description: Washington, D.C. — House Energy and Commerce Committee Republican Leader Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-WA) released the following statement on President Biden’s expected announcement to release oil from the Strategic Petroleum Reserve (SPR).

title: Latta: “Let’s work together to ensure all Americans have access to reliable broadband services”
description: Washington, D.C. — Communications and Technology Subcommittee Republican Leader Bob Latta (R-OH) delivered remarks during today’s FCC oversight hearing on the importance of congressional oversight to help Americans stay connected.

title: Leader Rodgers: This is an Attempt by Democrats to Revive Socialist Drug Pricing
description: Washington, D.C. — Energy and Commerce Committee Republican Leader Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-WA) spoke before the Rules Committee during a hearing on H.R. 6833, an attempt by Democrats to revive socialist drug pricing in the tax and spending spree and give Pharmacy Benefit Managers (PBMs) a pass to keep hiding savings from patients.

title: Leader Rodgers Health Subcommittee Remarks on FDA User Fee Reauthorization for Medical Devices
description: Washington, D.C. — House Energy and Commerce Committee Republican Leader Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-WA) delivered remarks at today’s Health Subcommittee hearing entitled “FDA User Fee Reauthorization: Ensuring Safe and Effective Medical Devices.”

title: Subcommittee Leader McKinley Opening Remarks at Hearing on Safe Drinking Water
description: Washington, D.C. — In the Environment and Climate Change Subcommittee hearing today, Subcommittee Republican Leader David B. McKinley (R-WV) delivered the following opening remarks about safe drinking water.

title: Rep. Buddy Carter: Inflation is Making it Harder for People to Pay for Basic Expenses
description: Federal Spending Must be Accountable to the People

title: President Biden’s Price Hike and America’s Pain at the Pump
Communities in Need: Legislation to Support Mental Health and Well-Being
Connecting America: Oversight of the FCC
FDA User Fee Reauthorization: Ensuring Safe and Effective Medical Devices
Trusting the Tap: Upgrading America’s Drinking Water Infrastructure
